dc_description_s: This datalayer comprises the four subway and streetcar lines in the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority’s rapid transit rail network. The four ‘T’ lines - Blue, Green, Orange, and Red - are represented with linework. Stations are contained in a node feature class. Station names are included in nodetext and annotation. The coverage was developed by the Central Transportation Planning Staff (CTPS) and is stored as a single statewide layer called MBTA. The Central Transportation Plannig Staff will update the datalayer as needed.
